name: presentation
description: Presentation for RAiD Aug 25 Engineering Meetup. Requires python to run

scripts.slides: concurrently -k -n static,mkslides -c green,cyan "npm run serve-static" "npm run serve-slides"
scripts.start-3: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && cd exercises/3_physical_schema && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start-4: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && cd exercises/4_indexing && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start-5: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && cd exercises/5_migrations && npm install && npm run start
